Static Public Member Functions
sys::Sched Class Reference

Documentation

The Sched class is used to change the scheduing policy of the current thread or process.

Static Public Member Functions

static pid_t get_pid ()
 
static int get_priority (pid_t pid)
 
static int get_priority_max (enum policy value)
 
static int get_priority_min (enum policy value)
 
static int get_rr_interval (pid_t pid)

static void yield ()
 

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum sys::Sched::policy
Enumerator
RR 

Round Robin style (task yields periodically)

FIFO 

First in, first out (task won't yield until it calls Sched::yield(), sleeps or uses Sync IO)

Member Function Documentation

static pid_t sys::Sched::get_pid ( )
inlinestatic

Gets the current proccess ID (equivalent to getpid()).

static int sys::Sched::get_priority ( pid_t  pid)
static

Gets the max priority for the specified policy.

static int sys::Sched::get_priority_max ( enum policy  value)
static

Gets the max priority for the specified policy.

static int sys::Sched::get_priority_min ( enum policy  value)
static

Gets the min priority for the specified policy.

static int sys::Sched::get_rr_interval ( pid_t  pid)
static

Gets the RR interval for the pid.

Parameters
pidThe process ID
Returns
The RR interval in microseconds
static int sys::Sched::set_scheduler ( pid_t  pid,
enum policy  value,
int  priority 
)
static

Sets the scheduler with the given parameters.

Parameters
pidThe process ID
valueThe polic (such as Sched::FIFO)
priorityThe priority (higher is higher priority)
Returns
Zero on success of -1 with errno set
static void sys::Sched::yield ( )
inlinestatic

Yields the processor to another thread or process.

It is the same as calling sched_yield().
